programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Back To School. Mr Bean cannot find anywhere to park other than the space he spots in a school’s car park. There’s a case of mistaken identity and Mr Bean finds himself teaching a class of unruly school kids. Bean uses every trick in the book to win them over and ends up teaching the headmaster how to be a success in school.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Lord Bean. Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wars. Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wedding Day. Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Singapore with Tom and Jerry as they weave through the labyrinth of towering estates and skyscrapers and bask in the vibrant green of the urban jungle.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Cash Machine. Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Bean's bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Litterbug. Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Surprise!
programme.desc: Surprise!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Shadow Boxin'. Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been trapped with Tom its entire life, the shadow refuses to go back to the life it once had. But when the shadow becomes a total nuisance to Tom and Jerry, they team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Slaphappy Birthday. It's Spike's birthday and he has been counting the days down. Every year, Rick goes all out to make it special, but not this one. He has forgotten! Seeing how sad Spike is, Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember. Unfortunately, their every effort backfires -- but don't worry, it ends happily.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Slinging in the Rain. The storm of the century is brewing -- according to Tuffy and Jerry, that is, who are giving Tom a little payback for tormenting them earlier. Spike also gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry & The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are not in Kansas anymore. Fun, fresh and fanciful: Tom and Jerry star in an Oz-some original movie! They're off to see the wonderful Wizard of Oz! Tom and Jerry soar over the rainbow and travel down the yellow brick road in this animated retelling of the classic tale. You'll see your favorite characters: Dorothy, Toto,the Scarecrow, the Tin Man, the Lion, the Wicked Witch of the West, the Wizard, the Munchkins and more. You'll hear your favorite songs,including "Over the Rainbow." And you'll laugh at the antics of your favorite cat and mouse as they get twisted up in a twister, go paw to paw against flying monkeys and storm the Wicked Witch's castle in a heroic attempt to get Dorothy and Toto (and themselves) safely back to Kansas. After all, there's no place like home!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Parking. Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Artful Bean. There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Fly. When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, it's war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Arlo's Portrait. Lucas decides to paint a portrait of Arlo. But Arlo can't sit still.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: House Flies Don't Dance. Lucas and Maizie try and help Findley learn how to dance.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: The Insult. When Lucas calls Findley a mean name, he tries to make things right again.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Laughing Matter. The Queen is unveiling a new statue of herself, in great pomp and circumstance, but nobody is paying any attention: they’re too busy getting entertained by a very comedic King. Green with envy, the Queen tries to crack a joke of her own… but no-one so much as snickers! Seriously miffed, she outlaws laughing in Wonderland and arrests anyone who dare so much as smile! In an attempt to lift this sad decree, Alice & Lewis do everything in their power to restore the Queen’s appetite for laughter.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Perfect Suspect. The Queen’s throne has mysteriously gone missing! Convinced that her niece is responsible for it, the Queen commissions Alice and Lewis to find proof of the girl’s guilt. Fearing the Queen’s wrath, Lewis goes out of his way to try and find incriminating evidence against Dinah while Alice does all she can to prove the teen’s innocence!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Pouting Match
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Big Top Tom. After believing that Jerry has been eaten by a hungry bear cub, Tom must avoid the mama bear's wrath as he tries to retrieve his pal. Meanwhile, oblivious to Tom's plight, Jerry's enjoying the perks of circus life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: X Marks the Thumpin'. Not wanting to miss a marathon of their favorite TV show, Butch and Meathead give Tom a fake treasure map in exchange for a little TV time. While they try to get comfortable in Rick and Ginger's house, Tom and Jerry must figure out a way to circumvent Spike when they realize his house is sitting directly atop their riches.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Dragon Down the Holidays. Hildie sends Tom and Jerry into the woods to find a baby dragon who they befriend on their way home. But when Hildie tells them she plans on making the dragon into dinner, Tom and Jerry work together to save him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Baby Blues. While Rick and Ginger are looking after their adorable niece for the weekend, Rick jokingly puts Spike in charge of keeping the kid safe while Ginger goes to the store. Taking his new job seriously, Spike swears that nothing will happen to the baby. Naturally, this is where Tom and Jerry arrive on the scene to wreak havoc and make Spike's babysitting job quite possibly be his last!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Build-A-Beast. When Hildie and Beatie believe they've had a few of their things stolen, they employ a little magic to create Bog, the Cottage Beast. In order to prove that Bog is overkill, however, Tom and Jerry must confess to borrowing the "stolen" goods to beat up on each other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: No Fly Zone. After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen – only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese – including waking up Tom!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Charity Case. Feeling bad for giving Tom's precious blanket to "Badwill," Jerry's determined to get it back. But with all the bizarre, enchanted items that have been donated over the centuries, getting anything back from Badwill is not easily done.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scaredy Bean. Who's afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. He's very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Bean’s imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Gadget Kid. Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you can’t even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Bloom Patrol. Lucas and his friends are excited to see a flower bloom.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Behind the Door. Lucas finds a door at the base of Arlo’s tree – Who does it belong to?

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Genea Tree. Claiming he has royal blood, Dodson makes himself at home in the castle! Enraged, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to go and check out this information on the Genea Tree, which contains the skinny on every Wonderland inhabitant’s background. The two friends go on a long journey with Dodson, all the way to the tree. And while they are very unsurprised to learn that he was lying about his royal background, they make a very astonishing discovery in the meantime.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Royal Zit. Tonight, Wonderland will be enjoying the humongously fun Twee-Lights Celebration! But when Alice and Lewis spot a huge zit on the Queen’s nose, it’s panic stations! Lewis knows the Queen only too well: he’s certain that if she notices this bulging boil, she’ll cancel the whole event! Our two heroes go out of their way to hide the pimple from the Queen until nightfall, when the celebration will begin. Not easy, considering Her Majesty loves to gaze at her own reflection…

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: School Daze

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Junkyard Pup. When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump, Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before Ace and Rocco – the junkyard guard dogs – turn him into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Newspaper. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Viral Bean. Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Library’s computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Super Spy. Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Scout Bean. Mr Bean inadvertently causes an accident which prevents Irma taking the scout troop to Big Bear’s Scout Camp. With the scout master and mini bus out of action Mr Bean steps in to save the day. As temporary scoutmaster Mr Bean enjoys his new role but his obsessive badge collecting wins him no friends within the group.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: What Goes Around Comes Around. Tom is up to his usual nonsense, but two can play at this game as they take their chase into the neighbourhood. Leave it to Jerry to turn the tables on Tom!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Coconut Shy. Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Green Bean. Mr Bean’s electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Bean’s flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Bean’s wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks
programme.desc: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Return to Sender. When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few "dead ends."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Reward if Lost. After Jerry mocks up a "Reward If Found" poster for Tom with the address of a neighbor with a ferocious dog, some good Samaritans bring Tom "home." Now, Tom has to escape from the house with his nine lives intact before he's brought back again and again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: The Lost Dragon
programme.desc: Everyone's favorite cat and mouse are back with song, sorcery and slapstick in this enchanted all-new Tom and Jerry original movie. When Tom and Jerry happen upon a mysterious glowing egg, little do they know that it was stolen from a very large fire-breathing dragon! It's not long before baby Puffy hatches and chooses Tom as his mommy! The angry mama dragon wants her baby -- but she's not the only one. A powerful witch named Drizelda captures the baby dragon for her own wicked plans! With the help of powerful allies and animal friends, Tom and Jerry fight the witch tooth and claw to get Puffy safely back to his mother. The action takes flight in a climactic ending filled with might, magic and cartoon mayhem, of course! Can Tom and Jerry help the tale end happily ever after? Find out in this rip-roaring adventure for the whole family!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Singapore with Tom and Jerry as they weave through the labyrinth of towering estates and skyscrapers and bask in the vibrant green of the urban jungle.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III

All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Flying. After watching Findley in flight, Lucas wonders what it would be like to fly.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Starry Lake. Alice, Lewis and the young star, Stella, are having the time of their lives down at the Starry Lake! But their rowdy playing wakes the Queen during her nap! She decides that the only way to get some peace and quiet is to empty the body of water! But Alice and Lewis aren’t going to stand by and let that happen: they decide to defend this location tooth and nail against the Queen and her Cards – the lake is the only place where the little star can come to regenerate.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Gift Day. When Alice finds out that the King of Frostaland often gives presents to the Queen but never gets a single gift back, she persuades Lewis to add a new rule to the Big Book under the heading of “Gift Day.” As per this new decree, anyone who receives a present on this particular day must give an even nicer one back to the person who gave it. Taking this very literally and seeing it as a competition, the King and Queen soon get into an “outmatching match,” even going so far as to gift each other their respective castles! Unable to reverse it, the Queen has no choice but to set up residence in Frostaland while the King moves in to her abode!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Mind Your Manners
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ghost Party. When the Witches leave on vacation Tom's dreams of rest and relaxation are ruined when their ghost nephew Grayson comes over and throws a giant ghost party. When he steals the witches' crystal ball Tom and Jerry must travel into the afterlife to steal it back.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat-Astrophe. Bigby invents the Asteroid Buster Elite which Jerry uses for fun to destroy asteroids. Tom accidentally gives himself electrical superpowers after causing a power outage. Jerry must fend off Tom while fighting off an asteroid heading right toward their lab.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Curse Case Scenario. Tom and Jerry are hired by Dutch to find his missing cursed ruby that causes him to have bad luck when it's missing. They help him find Roxie the burglar but find out that she's also being cursed by the ruby.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Reward if Lost. After Jerry mocks up a "Reward If Found" poster for Tom with the address of a neighbor with a ferocious dog, some good Samaritans bring Tom "home." Now, Tom has to escape from the house with his nine lives intact before he's brought back again and again.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inventor. When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become ‘inventive’ himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost ‘a cleverness competition’, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Car Trouble. Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Restaurant. Mr. Bean’s Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Art thief. During a visit to London's National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean ‘the International Art Sleuth’ prove successful?

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Jumping Pal. Lucas encounters a peculiar creature - A Jumping Bean.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Laughing Matter. The Queen is unveiling a new statue of herself, in great pomp and circumstance, but nobody is paying any attention: they’re too busy getting entertained by a very comedic King. Green with envy, the Queen tries to crack a joke of her own… but no-one so much as snickers! Seriously miffed, she outlaws laughing in Wonderland and arrests anyone who dare so much as smile! In an attempt to lift this sad decree, Alice & Lewis do everything in their power to restore the Queen’s appetite for laughter.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Perfect Suspect. The Queen’s throne has mysteriously gone missing! Convinced that her niece is responsible for it, the Queen commissions Alice and Lewis to find proof of the girl’s guilt. Fearing the Queen’s wrath, Lewis goes out of his way to try and find incriminating evidence against Dinah while Alice does all she can to prove the teen’s innocence!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.sub-title: The Ol' Switcheroo. Tuffy's wish to be as strong as Spike comes true.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.sub-title: How to be a Dog. Spike demonstrates for Tuffy what it takes to be a dog.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Valentine's Bean. Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: All You Can Eat. Mr Bean has forgotten he's supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Flat Pack. Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Holiday Teddy. Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Singapore with Tom and Jerry as they weave through the labyrinth of towering estates and skyscrapers and bask in the vibrant green of the urban jungle.

Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Dcéra. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: Do rodiny sa vracia aj Františkova a Zuzanina dcéra Milka. František chce Zuzanu prekvapiť a príchod dcéry utají. Nechtiac na neho spadne podozrenie, že sa stretáva s mladou milenkou.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Vzácna návšteva. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: František sa nechal oklamať podvodníkmi a z bytu im vymontovali všetky okná, no nové nedoniesli. Musí vyriešiť, ako usporiadať večeru so šéfom, ktorý má k ním prísť na návštevu. Dostane nápad – vymenia si s Lászloom byty. Lászlo sa ako dobrý sused a kamarát obetuje napriek tomu, že má chrípku a prievan v byte mu len priťaží.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Michaela má 6 detí s dvomi mužmi, s druhým mužom býva u svokrovcov, keďže si nemôžu dovoliť vlastné bývanie. Jej 14 ročná dcéra Silvia však odluku od otca ťažko zvláda a často uteká aj na 2 dni preč z domu. Gizka sa rozhodne poslať ju na liečenie a učí celú rodinu ako takúto situáciu zvládať.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Krv nie je voda: Päťdesiatnici Jana s Romanom majú dve dcéry. Staršia Soňa sa od rodičov odsťahovala najmä kvôli náročnému vzťahu s otcom. Je sebestačná, šikovná a túži po vlastnej rodine. Mladšia Dominika na rozdiel od staršej sestry nikam nesmeruje a túži po jedinom – mať sa dobre a nejako prežiť. To sa jej aj celkom darí, pretože otec ju bezhranične podporuje. Všetko sa však zmení po jednej smiešnej výhre v tombole...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Besnota: Marek začal podnikať – z odpadových kožiek na lesnej správe šije motorkárske vesty. Ildikó trápi vzťah Gergelyho a Andrejky. László jej daruje golier z líšky, ktorý dostal od Mareka. Sladká má nového milenca Luigiho, ktorý náruživo separuje odpad, páčia sa mu fúzy a tiež hrá na violončelo ako Gergely. Ako zvládnu susedia ukradnuté balíky papiera, besnotu a violončelové koncerty?

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Juraj dostane nepodmienečný trest a nič ho už neuchráni pred nástupom do väzenia. Nora je presvedčená, že Romanovi sa podarilo ujsť, no Michala napadne ešte jedno miesto, kde by ho mohli nájsť. Podarí sa Paule napriek komplikáciam porodiť zdravú dcérku?

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zlodej: Litvákovci sú pyšní na to, že žijú v modernej novostavbe. Robo pracuje na dobre platenom mieste, Magda sa stará o domácnosť. Obaja sa tešia zo syna Daniela, ktorý študuje na gymnáziu. Ten sa však proti otcovej vôli skamaráti s novým susedom Šaňom, Rómom...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Podvod: Sedemdesiatnička Ružena je tou osobou v rodine, ktorá spája všetkých jej členov. Keďže o svojho jediného syna prišla, o to viac sa upla na vnúčatá, najmä vnuka Šimona. Ten je trochu ľahkovážny, preto Ružena sa o neho začne obávať najmä po tom, čo si kúpi novú motorku. Žiaľ, jedného dňa si vypočuje o Šimonovi nepríjemný telefonát...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Búrlivé víno
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2013).
programme.desc: Martin Rozner sa po dlhom čase vracia do svojho rodného mestečka, aby navštívil rodičov. Prvý človek, ktorého tu stretne, je však Nina Dolinská. Ani jeden z nich v tejto chvíli netuší, ako veľmi ovplyvní život toho druhého... Dolinskí sú vychýrení vinári, ich podnik zamestnáva prakticky polovicu dediny, ako aj celú Ivanovu rodinu. Lenže teraz sa ich vinárstvo ocitlo na pokraji krachu. Otec Ivan má pre svoje deti nepríjemnú správu – ich rodinný podnik musia predať. Roznerovci sa do mestečka prisťahovali len nedávno, no pred niekoľkými rokmi tu celá ich rodina žila. Stanislav je tiež vinár a nechce dopustiť, aby vinárstvo Dolinských skrachovalo. O Ivanovi sa vyjadruje ako o veľmi blízkom priateľovi a chce mu úprimne pomôcť. O to šokujúcejšie je, keď ho Ivan veľmi ostro odmietne. Vykričí mu, aby zmizol a už nikdy viac sa nenazýval jeho priateľom. Stanislavovo choré srdce dostáva po týchto slovách ťažký úder... Aká krivda sa medzi nimi v minulosti odohrala, keď pochovala dlhoročné priateľstvo? Ivanova strašia dcéra Eva žije v strachu pred svojím manželom. Robo ju v minulosti zmlátil tak, že takmer prišla o život. Odvtedy žijú odlúčene. Ešte viac sa však snaží chrániť svoju dcérku Lauru. Eva je preto zdesená, keď sa Robo objaví pred dverami a vyhráža sa jej, že chce svoju rodinu späť... Nina pri prechádzke vinohradom opäť stretáva Martina, obaja sú si viac ako sympatickí. O to viac Ninu zamrazí zistenie, že Martin sa volá Rozner... Ako zareaguje Nina? Počúvne otca alebo urobí to, čo jej napovedá srdce? Doma sa zatiaľ odohráva oveľa väčšia dráma. Robo si vyčkal, kým sa Eva vytratí z domu a prišiel uniesť Lauru. Tá sa mu však vzpierala a po vzájomnej potýčke malá Laura spadla zo schodov tak, že zostala nehybne ležať na zemi. Robo z miesta činu zbabelo ušiel, kým Laura začína zvádzať boj o svoj vlastný život... Príde pomoc včas?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Najkrajšia bytovka: Ildikó sa opäť ráno vracia rozžiarená v župane domov s veľkým balíkom. László začína vážne žiarliť. Neupokojí ho ani to, že Ildikó len dala opäť urobiť veľké svadobné fotografie Milky a Gergeja. Andrejka zapája všetkých do súťaže o najkrajšiu bytovku. Núti ich upratať a vyzdobiť kvetmi balkón, umyť okná, z trávnika okolo domu vyzbierať smeti a psie výkaly a dokonca si aj poumývať autá na parkovisku. Ildikó opäť prichytí Gergeja s Andrejkou takmer inflagranti! Susedia sa rozhodnú, že Andrejke musia nájsť partnera, aby správnym smerom usmernili jej energiu a zachránili Milkine manželstvo. Ako zareaguje Milka na údajnú Gergejovu neveru? Podarí sa všetkým spoločne získať diplom pre najkrajšiu bytovku? Prečo dala Ildi tentoraz svadobné fotografie zarámovať aj so sklom? Kto odvezie Lászlóa a Františka do nemocnice a bude ich obetavosť odmenená úspešným vyriešením tejto situácie?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Výročník: Minulý týždeň dal László Františkovi darček. Podpivník z podniku kde sa pred 30-timi rokmi začalo ich priateľstvo. František mu na oplátku daroval pohár z piva, ktoré tam píjavali. Lenže na fotografii s čašníčkou Lucianou s bujným poprsím, z ktorej každý opatruje jednu polovicu, vidno že v krčme sa čapovala úplne iná značka! Pre Lászlóa je to koniec ich priateľstva. Ildikó aj Zuzane vadí, že Andrejkin nový frajer, doktor Vojtíšek, v snahe zapadnúť, je veľmi "vlezlý". Je ale veľmi slušný a takého človeka je ťažko vyhodiť. Zuzana chce z ich štvorice doplnenej o Martu vytvoriť silnú komunitu, aby pochopil, že tam nepatrí a dal pokoj. Lenže najprv musia udobriť Lászlóa s Františkom. Uskutočnia happening, kde zrekonštruujú ich prvé stretnutie. Čo odhalia pri hľadaní dobových rekvizít vo Františkovej "škatuli na spomienky"? Čo spája Lászlóa a Františka s atraktívnou čašníčkou okrem spomienok? Podarí sa im ju po toľkých rokoch nájsť? Ako dopadne celé udobrovanie?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Babský večer: Marta je frustrovaná, musí variť, aby si udržala chlapa. Zuzana má tiež všetkého po krk. Rozhodnú sa, že jeden deň v mesiaci bude "babský večer". Šampanské, vodná fajka a striptér! A najlepšie, ak sa to uskutoční ešte dnes. Andrejka musí zrušiť romantickú večeru s frajerom, a Ildikó, musí zorganizovať stráženie Ágoštona Lászlóom a Františkom u Milky, ktorá na nich dohliadne. Zuzana Milku na akciu nechce pozývať, lebo pred dcérou, by sa nedokázala uvoľniť. František s Lászlóom pre Ágoštona a Evana vymyslia program na Lesnej správe. László si pre istotu dá dvojnásobnú dávku nových piluliek na upokojenie. Ako dopadne detský deň na Lesnej správe? Podarí sa Marte zohnať náhradu za striptéra, ktorý ochorel? Aké vedľajšie účinky má predávkovanie sa Lászlóovými tabletkami? Čo na babskej žúrke bez manželov a partnerov robí Martin frajer?! A kto nepozvaný sa tam ešte objaví?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Pytačky: Zuzana má problém - drobné poškodenie cudzieho auta na parkovisku pred domom. Aj Milka má problém: s Gergejom si rozdelili náklady, ale energie a voda čo mal na starosti ostali nezaplatené. Prosí Františka, aby sa porozprával s Lászlóom a vyriešili to. Zuzana sa však “naštartuje" a ide to riešiť ona. Aj Ildi má problém, na parkovisku jej niekto oškrel auto. László sa chystá, že odhalí páchateľa. Keď príde Zuzana s Milkinou sťažnosťou, Ildi preberá iniciatívu a ide vysvetliť Milke, že je to nedorozumenie. Radšej by sa ona mala o Gergeja viac starať a najlepšie by bolo, keby počali spoločné dieťa. Inak si bude Andrejka stále brúsiť zuby na svojho bývalého frajera. Andrejkin nový priateľ - doktor Vojtíšek, nie je žiadna záruka. Andrejka však potrebuje poradiť. Spozorovala náznaky, že Bobík, ju chce požiadať o ruku. Všetci sú opatrní a radia jej vyčkať. Len Ildikó ju chce okamžite presvedčiť, aby povedala áno! Lászlóa a Františka na lesnej správe prekvapí aj doktor, ktorý hľadá radu v rovnakej veci. Bude László proti vlastnému presvedčeniu tlačiť Andrejku a Bobíka do zásnub? Dozvie sa Ildikó, kto jej oškrel auto? Ako to dopadne, ak požiada Bobík Andrejku naozaj o ruku? A prečo sa u Františka koná ďalšie stretnutie o 3 dni neskôr?

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Obľúbená reality šou Farma je späť! Neuveriteľná 14. séria sa opäť predstaví v originálnom novom koncepte a s množstvom zaujímavých prekvapení. Jedným z nich je aj zmena na poste moderátora - populárny herec Marek Fašiang sa stane prvým mužským moderátorom v histórii šou. Na moderovanie však nebude sám. Okrem neho a hospodára Martina Bagara bude na farmárov jedným očkom dohliadať Alica – umelá inteligencia. Najprevratnejšia novinka na Farme však nezmení tradičný koncept šou. Farmári si stále budú musieť poradiť s drsnými podmienkami na statku, s nedostatkom jedla či manuálnou prácou. Alica sa bude súťažiacim pravidelne prihovárať spoza stola pravdy vo farmárskej kuchyni. Bude s nimi voliť duelantov, odovzdávať im aj odkaz od vypadnutého súťažiaceho a neustále ich sledovať. Keď to vyhodnotí ako potrebné, tak zasiahne. Farmári si budú musieť zvyknúť na to, že Alica, ako umelá inteligencia, nemá žiadne city. Nepozná ani zľutovanie. Za príjemným ženským hlasom sa skrýva silný charakter. Alicina silná stránka sú dáta a čísla. Je výborná v analýzach, o farmároch vie takmer všetko a vždy má pravdu. Za moment dokáže rozlúsknuť konflikty. Pre farmárov bude poriadnym šokom, ktorý v boji o 75-tisíc eur určite nečakali.

programme.title: Doktori
programme.sub-title: „Život je pes“. Seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Robert jasne vidí spoločný život s Klárou a jeho plány zahŕňajú aj predaj jej bytu, ktorý si ešte kedysi kúpila s Tomášom. Trvá na tom, aby išla žiť k nemu a ukáže jej dokonca pozemok, na ktorom by mal v krátkej budúcnosti stáť ich nový dom. Klára z Robertových plánov nie je nadšená, ale šok zažije až vtedy, keď zistí, že Robert ponúkol jej byt na predaj práve Tomášovi. Empatická Klára rieši zložitý prípad aj v nemocnici, kde záchranári prinesú kolabujúceho mrzutého dôchodcu, o ktorého okrem jeho psa nejaví záujem nikto. Opusteného psa sa dočasne ujme mladý lekár Jakub a Klára sa snaží dozvedieť pravdu o pacientovej dcére, ktorá má na svojho otca ťažké srdce a nie je ochotná sa s ním zmieriť.

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Zlodej: Litvákovci sú pyšní na to, že žijú v modernej novostavbe. Robo pracuje na dobre platenom mieste, Magda sa stará o domácnosť. Obaja sa tešia zo syna Daniela, ktorý študuje na gymnáziu. Ten sa však proti otcovej vôli skamaráti s novým susedom Šaňom, Rómom...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Krv nie je voda: Päťdesiatnici Jana s Romanom majú dve dcéry. Staršia Soňa sa od rodičov odsťahovala najmä kvôli náročnému vzťahu s otcom. Je sebestačná, šikovná a túži po vlastnej rodine. Mladšia Dominika na rozdiel od staršej sestry nikam nesmeruje a túži po jedinom – mať sa dobre a nejako prežiť. To sa jej aj celkom darí, pretože otec ju bezhranične podporuje. Všetko sa však zmení po jednej smiešnej výhre v tombole...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Sekretárka. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: František nastupuje na nové pracovné miesto, bude robiť na ministerstve v sekcii boja s lesnou kriminalitou. Zuzana aj Ildikó sa uchádzajú o miesto sekretárky, čo spôsobí medzi nimi rivalitu.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Gergely. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: Františka a jeho novú sekretárku Ildikó čaká prvý deň v práci. Kým Františkovi sa na ministerstve hneď stane nehoda s pascami, Ildikó sa do práce ani nemôže dostaviť, keďže musí ísť po syna Gergelya na letisko. Dohodne sa so Zuzou, že ju zaskočí, no tá si popletie ministerstvo vnútra a ministerstvo obrany. Lázsló narýchlo zoženie Martu. Tá ale na ministra príliš veľký dojem neurobí. Ani keď prichádza konečne Ildikó sa veci nezlepšia, pretože obleje ministra kávou. Lázsló sa medzitým víta so synom Gergelyom.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Marika je týraná žena žijúca vo veľmi zlých podmienkach bez elektriny. So súrodencami nemá veľmi dobré vzťahy a to by rada napravila. Má 3 poslušné a múdre deti.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Na dvoch kolesách: Manželia Lenka a Jakub sú jeden z tých párov o ktorých všetci tvrdia, že sa „našli“. Majú harmonický vzťah aj po dvadsiatich rokoch a spoločne vychovávajú päťnásťročnú dcéru Rebeku. Všetko sa však zmení po Jakubovej nehode – lekári Lenke oznámia, že zrejme už nikdy nebude vedieť chodiť...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Gergely sa vracia: Syn Gergely volá Ildikó, že príde domov na návštevu. Andrejka sa chce kvôli novému frajerovi naučiť nejaké maďarské slovíčka. Zuzana je pozvaná na otvorenie nového kasína. Darčekový žetón pripomenie Františkovi Zuzaninu hráčsku závislosť a dá ho radšej Lászlovi. Ten však musí všetko utajiť pred Ildikó, ktorá neznáša hazard. Vyhrá László v kasíne veľké peniaze? Kto je Andrejkin maďarský rocker a kto Gergelyova nová frajerka letuška? A ako sa so všetkým vyrovná Ildikó?

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Rodina Lánskych bude mať poplach skôr ako čakali, Paula rodí! Nore sa podarí nahrať Romanove priznanie aj pravdivú verziu Vladovej vraždy. Svadobčania majú svoj veľký deň pred sebou, no nebude taký, aký si ho vysnívali.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Alfonz: Vdova Marta s dospievajúcou dcérou Michaelou žije v novej bytovke. Veľmi si želá, aby sa dcéra stala lekárkou, no tú pri učení vyrušujú hluční susedia bývajúci o poschodie vyššie. K nim sa navyše nasťahoval dôchodca Alfonz, ktorý tvrdí, aké to má ťažké...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Krv nie je voda: Päťdesiatnici Jana s Romanom majú dve dcéry. Staršia Soňa sa od rodičov odsťahovala najmä kvôli náročnému vzťahu s otcom. Je sebestačná, šikovná a túži po vlastnej rodine. Mladšia Dominika na rozdiel od staršej sestry nikam nesmeruje a túži po jedinom – mať sa dobre a nejako prežiť. To sa jej aj celkom darí, pretože otec ju bezhranične podporuje. Všetko sa však zmení po jednej smiešnej výhre v tombole...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Juraj dostane nepodmienečný trest a nič ho už neuchráni pred nástupom do väzenia. Nora je presvedčená, že Romanovi sa podarilo ujsť, no Michala napadne ešte jedno miesto, kde by ho mohli nájsť. Podarí sa Paule napriek komplikáciam porodiť zdravú dcérku?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Kto za pravdu horí. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Horná Dolná potrebuje vlastné noviny. Starosta si robí starosti, koho dôležitou úlohou poverí. Nakoniec prácu šéfredaktora zverí Lackovi. Lacko však chce byť investigatívny novinár, takže sa zakrátko stane postrachom celej dediny...

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Bezdomovec. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: : Do Hornej Dolnej sa priplichtí bezdomovec. A akurát v deň, keď Ďurovi rozkvapkali oči, takže je v tom nevinne, pretože šoférovala Erika...

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Obojok. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ďuro opäť raz zvalcuje Sojku. Lenže tentoraz je to naozaj vážne. Sojka je v bezvedomí a Ďura pri tom videli ozajstní policajti. Ďuro tak musí byť exemplárne potrestaný...

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Obľúbená reality šou Farma je späť! Neuveriteľná 14. séria sa opäť predstaví v originálnom novom koncepte a s množstvom zaujímavých prekvapení. Jedným z nich je aj zmena na poste moderátora - populárny herec Marek Fašiang sa stane prvým mužským moderátorom v histórii šou. Na moderovanie však nebude sám. Okrem neho a hospodára Martina Bagara bude na farmárov jedným očkom dohliadať Alica – umelá inteligencia. Najprevratnejšia novinka na Farme však nezmení tradičný koncept šou. Farmári si stále budú musieť poradiť s drsnými podmienkami na statku, s nedostatkom jedla či manuálnou prácou. Alica sa bude súťažiacim pravidelne prihovárať spoza stola pravdy vo farmárskej kuchyni. Bude s nimi voliť duelantov, odovzdávať im aj odkaz od vypadnutého súťažiaceho a neustále ich sledovať. Keď to vyhodnotí ako potrebné, tak zasiahne. Alicina silná stránka sú dáta a čísla. Je výborná v analýzach, o farmároch vie takmer všetko a vždy má pravdu. Za moment dokáže rozlúsknuť konflikty. Pre farmárov bude poriadnym šokom, ktorý v boji o 75-tisíc eur určite nečakali.

programme.title: Doktori
programme.sub-title: „Srdcu nerozkážeš“. Seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Klára je mladá a úspešná lekárka. Je čerstvo zasnúbená s kolegom Robertom, keď jej do života vstúpi jej stará láska Tomáš. Klára z jeho príchodu do nemocnice nie je nadšená, pretože jeho prítomnosť v nej oživuje bolestné spomienky na minulosť, kedy ju Tomáš nechal len pár dní pred ich svadbou. Klára sa bude musieť vyrovnať s faktom, že Tomáša bude denne vídať, pretože opäť prijal miesto chirurga na kardiológii. Stalo sa tak potom, ako asistoval pri záchrane života mladého dievčaťa s vrodenou srdcovou chybou, ktoré do nemocnice priviezol záchranársky vrtuľník rovno z lyžiarskeho strediska. Stav dievčaťa sa náhle zhorší a jedinou jej šancou na prežitie je okamžitá transplantácia...

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
